 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חָבַב‎</span>] **verb** ==love== (Late Hebrew Pi\`el ***id.***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***be loved***; Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***amore alicujus incendi*** [[BDB#Di|Di]]; Aramaic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***kindle, be set on fire***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חַבֵּב‎</span> ***love, embrace***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חוּבָּא‎</span> ***bosom***) — 

**Qal** ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַף‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֹבֵב עַמִּים‎</span> [[Deut.33.3|Deut 33:3]] ([[BDB#Di|Di]] reads <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַמּוֺ‎</span>, compare [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]]).
